root.correctText: I will go to the store and buy an MP3 player.
root.incorrectText: I will go to the store and buy a MP3 player.

explanationNodes.text:
We use the word "an" instead "a" when the following word starts with a vowel.

This improves the sound and ease of speaking.

Therefore, not the spelling, but the pronounciation matters. MP3 player is pronounced "em P 3" so it "kind of" starts with a vowel.
